alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 02 at 1:27PM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills dropping to between 30 and 40 below zero. Northwest winds gusts between 35 and 55 mph Friday and Friday night with the strongest of those winds tending to be in the higher terrain. * WHERE...Northern Worcester and Northern Middlesex Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 1 PM EST Saturday. Lowest of those wind chills will occur Friday night into mid-morning Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusts between 35 and 55 mph Friday and Friday night with the strongest of those winds tending to be in the higher terrain. Isolated power outages possible especially in the high terrain.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
